title: The Royal tour: the West Indies
brief_description: In the year of her coronation, Queen Elizabeth and Prince Philip are shown visiting the West Indies (Jamaica) and Panama (Panama Canal). Sequences include - Jamaica: arrival ceremony; procession to Kingston; military parade; children’s display and Panama: street scenes; folk dances; workings of canal.
